bibl.title: Identifying the Language of the Individual in the Zenon Archive.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Amyntas weakness. - 3. A method for analysis. - 4. The evidence of the Zenon archive. - 5. Palaeographic issues and some presumed autographs. - 6. The case study [Amyntas' aspirated perfect ἀφέσταλκα]. - 7. Conclusions. - Pp. 69-70: Appendix: Documents from Amyntas.
bibl.seg: EVANS Trevor V., Identifying the Language of the Individual in the Zenon Archive.
Trevor V. EVANS and Dirk D. OBBINK (Edd.), The Language of the Papyri (Oxford, 2010) pp. 51-70, 7 figg.

1. Introduction. - 2. Amyntas weakness. - 3. A method for analysis. - 4. The evidence of the Zenon archive. - 5. Palaeographic issues and some presumed autographs. - 6. The case study [Amyntas' aspirated perfect ἀφέσταλκα]. - 7. Conclusions. - Pp. 69-70: Appendix: Documents from Amyntas.
